title: Create and wire up a maintained WebKit fork for Windows builds + LayoutTests/WPT subset
goal: Set up a maintainable WebKit fork with Windows CI, ability to run LayoutTests/WPT subset, and serve as the reference implementation for the Rust rewrite.

gates.cmd: python -c "content = open('docs/WEBKIT-FORK-SETUP.md', encoding='utf-8').read(); assert 'Minimal Reproductions' in content, 'Missing reproduction docs'"

steps: Document WebKit fork setup and sync strategy
Create Windows build script for WinCairo port
Document minimal reproductions for resize, multi-view, and callback issues
Define LayoutTests/WPT subset to run for validation
Set up local test runner for regression detection

rollback.strategy: Revert documentation and scripts if fork strategy changes
